          <title>
            <string language="en">Flame emission spectroscopy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flammeemissionspektroskopie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Spectroscopie d'émission de flamme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Spectroscopy da emissão da flama</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spettroscopia dell'emissione della fiamma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φασματοσκοπία εκπομπής φλογών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Espectroscopia de la emisión de la llama</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show a simplified diagram of a flame atomic emission spectrometer (top) and the different parts of a flame (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>

          <structure>

            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen ein vereinfachtes 
Diagramm eines Flammeatomemissionspektrometers (Oberseite) und die 
unterschiedlichen Teile einer Flamme (Unterseite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent un diagramme 
simplifié d'un spectromètre atomique d'émission de flamme (dessus) 
et les différentes parties d'une flamme (bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram um diagrama 
simplificado de um spectrometer atômico da emissão da flama (alto) e
as partes diferentes de uma flama (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano uno schema 
semplificato di uno spettrometro atomico dell'emissione della fiamma 
(parte superiore) e le parti differenti di una fiamma (parte 
inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν ένα απλουστευμένο 
διάγραμμα ενός ατομικού φασματομέτρου εκπομπής φλογών (κορυφή) 
και διαφορετικά μέρη μιας φλόγας (κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran un diagrama 
simplificado de un espectrómetro atómico de la emisión de la llama 
(tapa) y las diversas partes de una llama (fondo).</string>
          </description>
